pkgmetadata.longdescription: Py Clock========A clock made of words.. code:: bash Usage: py-clock [OPTIONS] Options: -s, --show Show the current time -m, --matrix Show time as matrix -d, --debug Run in debug mode -h, --help Show this message and exit. py-clock can print the current time in words format.For example: if the time is 13:50, it prints | **I T** L **I S** A S T H **T E N** | A C F I F T E E N D C O | T W E N T Y X F I V E W | T H I R T Y F T E N O S | **M I N U T E S** E **T O** U R | P A S T O R U F O U R T | S E V E N X T W E L V E | N I N E D I V E C **T W O** | E I G H T F E L E V E N | S I X T H R E E O N E G | T E N S E Z O' C L O C K
